participant_1.background:
I like to go out and have fun, but I also take care of my health by eating healthy and exercising regularly.
I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up.
my inspiration is clasical music.
i enjoy playing tennis.
My favourite book is The Brothers Karamazov because it is a complex and thought-provoking novel that explores the nature of good and evil.

participant_2.background:
My pets are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion.
My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.
I'm a 25-year-old female who loves the Fourth of July because the fireworks are so beautiful, but I'm scared of left turns.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
i commute by bus.

content.text: Hi! My favourite book is The Brothers Karamazov by Fyodor Dostoevsky. It's a complex and thought-provoking novel that explores the nature of good and evil. What's yours?
It's a great book! Mine is The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald. It's a beautiful novel about the American Dream and the pursuit of happiness.
I love that book too! It's so sad but so beautiful.
I know, right? It's one of those books that you never forget.
Have you read any other books by F. Scott Fitzgerald?
Yes, I've read The Beautiful and Damned and Tender is the Night. They're both great books, but I think The Great Gatsby is my favourite.
I've read The Beautiful and Damned, but not Tender is the Night. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
It was great talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
